indicator_impact.title: Impact Indicator
indicator_impact.description: The label for the indicator used to report the impact:

unit_impact.title: Unit of Measure
unit_impact.description: The unit of measure for the impact:

extent_impact.title: Impact Extent
extent_impact.description: The extent or magnitude of the impact:

period_impact.title: Impact Period
period_impact.description: The period during which the impact occurred:

id_msg_drmr.title: DR-MR Message ID
id_msg_drmr.description: ID of the Hedera message that published the approving review of the monitoring report for the monitoring period in question:

uri_ipfs_drmr.title: DR-MR IPFS URI
uri_ipfs_drmr.description: IPFS URI of the approving review of the monitoring report for the monitoring period in question:

certificate_number.title: Certificate Number
certificate_number.description: The identification number for this Verified Impact Certificate
